pathfinding.​ XPS_PF_fnc_lineIntersect2D
_result = [_posA1, _posA2, _posB1, _posB2] call XPS_PF_fnc_lineIntersect2D
Description

Finds the point where two lines (A1->A2 and B1->B2) intersect on a 2D plane. If points given are 3D space, Z is averaged for posterity. Intersection only accounts for points in the 2D: [X,Y] plane.

Authors

Crashdome

Parameters
_posA1
Array

can be 2D or 3D point

_posA2
Array

can be 2D or 3D point

_posB1
Array

can be 2D or 3D point

_posB2
Array

can be 2D or 3D point

Returns
_result
Array

[x,y,z] format - (Z is averaged)
